span.a: COVID-19 District information in one location.

br.span: Kindergarten Registration Information We are looking for our little wildcats...

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: Winter weather is now upon us, which means the flu and other winter illnesses will soon follow. Some of these are unavoidable but there are several things you can do at home to help prevent illness and keep everyone feeling healthy.

Firelands Electric Co-op is sponsoring a wonderful opportunity for our students in grades 6-8 whose parents or guardians are members of Firelands Electric Co-op. Students must have a minimum of three A's on their most recent report card.

img.title: Harvard College
img.alt: District Joins Harvard Center on Rural Education

div.a: District Joins Harvard Center on Rural Education

b.span: Local school district to join Harvard center on rural education

i.span: The National Center for Rural Education Research Networks will address chronic absenteeism, college readiness, and college enrollment
